caption.p: Live, attenuated replication competent RVFV vaccines in use or in development.

tr.th: Adverse effects and other potential concerns

tr.td: Derived by empirical passage/ Not defined
Onderstepoort Biological Products (OBP) and (intermittently) other manufacturers (Egypt, Kenya)/50 years use in parts of Africa

list-item.p: Low rates of abortions in sheep
inconsistent availability, vaccine quality and stability

tr.td: Derived by empirical passage/ Internal deletion of 569 nucleotides in NSs

list-item.p: Single report of fetal malformations and stillbirths (experimental study only)

tr.td: No detectable viremia (ruminants) below threshold for mosquito infection
Derived by passage with chemical mutagenesis/ Multiple attenuating mutations in all 3 segments.
Zoetis/Conditionally licensed for use in U.S.

list-item.p: Single report of abortion in sheep (experimental study)

tr.td: Phase I-II trials with promising results
Low viremia in ruminants and humans, below threshold for mosquito infection
Derived by reverse genetics/ Deletion of NSm plus MP-12 attenuating mutations.
No detectable viremia in ruminants. Not infectious for mosquitoes.
Derived by reverse genetics. Deletion of NSs and NSm
No detectable viremia in ruminants. Not infectious for mosquitoes.
Derived by reverse genetics/ Split M segment, 4 segments, NSs deletion.
